channel.title: 🏢 Kiel University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Kiel University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: HydraViT: Stacking Heads for a Scalable ViT
item.description: HydraViT: Stacking attention heads creates a scalable Vision Transformer, adapting to diverse hardware by dynamically selecting subnetworks during inference, improving accuracy and efficiency.
